Class PuzzleGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.history.PuzzleGenerator

  • public class PuzzleGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Puzzle Generator class generates Puzzles based on critera which it is sent.

    • Method Detail

      • buildAnswer

        private void buildAnswer()
        Creates a crossword puzzle as a grid of Cubes.
        Parameters:
        answerWords - - A list of words to be fit into the puzzle
        language - - The Language Object to be used in determining the logical separation of characters to be placed in the puzzle.

      • fitWord

        private int fitWord(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> word,
          int x,
          int y,
          int checkDirection)
        Checks to see if a word fits in the puzzle, and how well it does so.
        Parameters:
        word - - The word to be fit into the puzzle.
        x - - The starting x position to test the word.
        y - - The starting y position to test the word.
        checkDirection - - The direction to attempt to fit the word - 0 Horizontal or 1 Vertical.
        Returns:
        - A number score representing how well it fit. - 0 Doesn't Fit, 1 Fits but doesn't intersect, 2+ Fits and has score-1 intersections(higher is better).

      • randInt

        private int randInt(int min,
          int max)
        Returns a random integer from min to max inclusively.
        Parameters:
        min - - The smallest number to be returned.
        max - - The largest number to be returned.
        Returns:
        - A random integer from min to max inclusively.

      • findLongestWord

        private static int findLongestWord(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> words)
        Returns the location in the List of words that contains the most logical characters.
        Parameters:
        words - - The list of words to compare the lengths of.
        Returns:
        - The location in the list of the longest word.
